Depart from Bangalore at 8:15 PM from our office premises for an overnight journey to Munnar

Arrive early morning in Munnar and check into the hotel by 11:00 AM. After breakfast, proceed for sightseeing. Munnar sightseeing will be conducted by jeep as large vehicles are not allowed by local authorities. Visit Mattupetty Dam, Tea Gardens, and optionally enjoy boating at Echo Point (additional cost). Explore Rajamalai (Eravikulam) National Park for wildlife. Overnight stay in Munnar.

After breakfast, depart for Thekkady. Upon arrival,Check into Hotel, After Lunch proceed to Periyar lake Enjoy boating on Periyar Lake and an elephant ride (at additional cost). Later in the evening enjoy spice market. Overnight stay in Thekkady.
